devdoc.author: The Moonbeam Team

params.innerCall: : The inner call to be executed from the derivated address

returns.result: The bytes associated with the encoded call

params.multilocation: The asset location for which we want to know the fee per second value

returns.feePerSecond: The fee per second that the reserve chain charges for this asset

params.index: The index of which we want to retrieve the account

returns.owner: The owner of the derivative index

params.multilocation: The location for which we want to know the transact info

returns.maxWeight: Maximum allowed weight for a single message in dest
returns.transactExtraWeight: The extra weight involved in the XCM message of using derivative
returns.transactExtraWeightSigned: The extra weight involved in the XCM message of using signed

transactThroughDerivative(uint8,uint16,a.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.currencyId: Address of the currencyId of the asset to be used for fees It has to be a reserve of the destination chain
params.feeAmount: Amount to be used as fee.
params.innerCall: The inner call to be executed in the destination chain
params.overallWeight: Overall weight to be used for the xcm message.
params.transactRequiredWeightAtMost: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain

transactThroughDerivativeMultilocation(u.details: The token transfer burns/transfers the corresponding amount before sending

params.feeAmount: Amount to be used as fee.
params.feeAsset: The asset in which we want to pay fees. It has to be a reserve of the destination chain
params.innerCall: The inner call to be executed in the destination chain
params.overallWeight: Overall weight to be used for the xcm message.
params.transactRequiredWeightAtMost: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain

transactThroughSigned((uint8,bytes[]),ad.details: No token is burnt before sending the message. The caller must ensure the destination is able to undertand the DescendOrigin message, and create a unique account from which dispatch the call

params.call: The call to be executed in the destination chain
params.dest: The destination chain (as multilocation) where to send the message
params.feeAmount: Amount to be used as fee.
params.feeLocationAddress: The ERC20 address of the token we want to use to pay for fees only callable if such an asset has been BRIDGED to our chain
params.overallWeight: Overall weight to be used for the xcm message.
params.transactRequiredWeightAtMost: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain for the call to be made

transactThroughSignedMultilocation((uint.details: No token is burnt before sending the message. The caller must ensure the destination is able to undertand the DescendOrigin message, and create a unique account from which dispatch the call

params.call: The call to be executed in the destination chain
params.dest: The destination chain (as multilocation) where to send the message
params.feeAmount: Amount to be used as fee.
params.feeLocation: The asset multilocation that indentifies the fee payment currency It has to be a reserve of the destination chain
params.overallWeight: Overall weight to be used for the xcm message.
params.transactRequiredWeightAtMost: The weight we want to buy in the destination chain for the call to be made

devdoc.title: Xcm Transactor Interface The interface through which solidity contracts will interact with xcm transactor pallet
